channel.title: Setting up my RSPS on my VPS
channel.description: So I just bought hostgator linux vps and now I have no idea what to do or how to run my server on the vps. Can someone tell me what to do?

item.title: Setting up my RSPS on my VPS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

4x4Chevrolet:

Again, “Can someone tell me what to do” isn’t a valid question, I could sit here and type a 10 page long essay on what to do. Which probably wouldn’t even work because I need to know what distribution your Linux is and WHAT ARE YOU HAVING PROBLEMS WITH? (Can you not transfer files, can you not get the server online, are there errors?)

He’s a typical kid with money.

He wants a server so he downloaded one and changed some names.
Bought a vps and put the server on it. And can’t understand why it won’t run with the WINDOWS batch files.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up my RSPS on my VPS
